channel.title: Stand up for your right to have Mopman on IRC!
channel.description:
[23:49.28] -NickServ- Nick mopman is currently suspended. - [23:49.28] -NickServ- Your nickname is now being changed to DaIRC16390
I also believe they are watching #aryan secretly, invasion of privacy much? :(

item.title: Stand up for your right to have Mopman on IRC!
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

Mod Ian:

IRC is a chatroom

no, its instant relay chat.

Read full topic
item.source: Stand up for your right to have Mopman on IRC!

item.title: Stand up for your right to have Mopman on IRC!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:38, topic:146423”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=200455.msg1793166#msg1793166 date=1191232364]
Also large IRC networks are not subject to script kiddies like RaW trying to take them down.
[/quote]

Actually, they are, if the script kiddies are half smart. DALNet was effectively taken down for quite some time by a group of skiddies a little while back, and that used to be one of the largest IRC networks.[/quote]

I said script kiddies like RaW, meaning they aren’t half smart.

Either way, it is easier to take down 1 server than a network.

Read full topic
item.source: Stand up for your right to have Mopman on IRC!

item.title: Stand up for your right to have Mopman on IRC!

item.description:
@Stroud wrote:

mopman for IRC, if you can’t handle it, fucking deal with it, fuckin BITCHES

but anyways yeah and no potatoes = no potato chips (the key to parties) = no more parties = no more fun (parties ARE the source of all fun) = people will get bored = people will commit suicide for the thrill = population decrease = end of the world as we know it!

so if you read that all you’ll see that if mopman isnt back on IRC, the world will disappear

item.title: Stand up for your right to have Mopman on IRC!

item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Also large IRC networks are not subject to script kiddies like RaW trying to take them down.

Actually, they are, if the script kiddies are half smart. DALNet was effectively taken down for quite some time by a group of skiddies a little while back, and that used to be one of the largest IRC networks.

Read full topic

item.title: Stand up for your right to have Mopman on IRC!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The IRC channel needs to stay on a decent sized public network. There are quite a few reasons why. They have multiple servers and are therefore always up and working. I remember times back in the kaitnieks.com era and then when moparisthebest.com used codestream and the servers weren’t accessible for weeks due to various errors. Also large IRC networks are not subject to script kiddies like RaW trying to take them down. If the community is under attack, we can always fall back to IRC. It really is best this way.

Read full topic
item.source: Stand up for your right to have Mopman on IRC!
